summary:
Over 10 years of Professional experience across SAP Core banking  modules such as SAP Loans management, SAP Master contract Management and consulting in Commercial and Retail Banking. Involved in multiple roles- as a functional consultant, business analyst, team leader, and individual contributor working both at client locations as well as at offshore across business process areas within banking.

As a business consultant, worked on solution conceptualization, requirement gathering, requirements analysis, gap analysis, interface mapping, functional specifications and consulting assessments.

certifications.name: SAP Certified Application Associate - Financial Accounting with SAP ERP ECC 6.0 EHP 4

profile_positions.description:
Project  : Implementation of SAP Loans at Rabobank
Domain : Lending

Responsibilities

Functional Consultant 
•	Understand the Business requirements of the client for configurations and customization of SAP Loans in E2E implementation
•	Gap analysis , Impact analysis and check requirements for cross component settings and ensure the best practice approach has been implemented
•	Configure master data and customize the settings in SAP to meet the requirement of commercial and retail lending business portfolios
•	Document the settings and get it reviewed from stake holders
•	Prepare and Update business blue print
•	Create Functional specifications for custom developments

Business analyst
•	Understand the business requirements of the client for configuration and customization of SAP Loans
•	Discuss with Product and Technical Specialist to arrive at the most viable solution to implement the requirement
•	Align with various stakeholders across the chain to ensure that business requirements from SAP loans can be met
•	Documentation of Business requirements and get stake holder approval
•	Support the implementation teams with inputs during the design and development stage

Production support
•	Effective & efficient Incident management & Change Management by identifying the root cause propose and execute the fixes
•	Involved in developing detailed functional specifications and configuration documents for all the Change Requests and Urgent /Hot fixes
•	Provide extensive support to the business users regarding business issues arising out of SAP
•	Provide training and troubleshooting including the identification and resolution of performance related issues
•	Provide support and Implementation launch go-live activities 
•	Perform EOD, EOY monitoring and functional support 
•	Monitoring day-to-day activities and fixing issues/problems as they occur
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed system operations of plants from head office by providing assistance and trainings on SAP FI process/functionalities
•	Solely responsible for the accounting sanctity of 6 company codes.
•	Acted as core team member in SAP Implementation, by discussing the business process and mapping of the same with SAP Consultants
•	Participate in discussion and have contributed ideas on the design of new system/processes and identify implications on policies, procedures and resources
•	Trained end users on handling operations using SAP
•	Participate in all testing activities (unit testing, integration testing and regression testing) and verify and endorse test results of the user team.
•	Handled posting of transactions in various modules of SAP like – Accounts Receivable, Accounts payable, Cash and Bank.
•	Creation of accounting records in SAP from Legacy system.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager Finance
